hero.title: Earnings Calculator
hero.description: Calculate your potential earnings as a tasker on ManzelHelp. See how much you can make based on your skills and availability.

platformFee.title: Platform Fee
platformFee.description: ManzelHelp charges a 10% platform fee to cover payment processing, customer support, and platform maintenance.

buildReputation.title: Build Your Reputation
buildReputation.description: Excellent reviews and ratings help you charge premium rates and get more bookings.

beAvailable.title: Be Available
beAvailable.description: Respond quickly to requests and maintain flexible availability to get more jobs.

expandSkills.title: Expand Your Skills
expandSkills.description: Learn new skills and offer additional services to increase your earning potential.

cta.title: Ready to Start Earning?
cta.description: Join thousands of taskers who are already earning money on ManzelHelp. Start your journey today!
